Type:

Product Description:

The moment you wake up, your eyes also start to perform its task, which is why you should not be surprised that your eyes also feel tired. This is most likely to happen if you are too exposed with digital device screens, doing activities that involve extended focus, or reading without pausing to rest your eyes. Good thing, there's HappyEyes‚Ñ¢ Wireless Eye Massager!

This revolutionary eye massager is made from soft silicone and ABS material that is guaranteed safe to the skin. It has 22-magnets spread around the eye massager that give scientific and comprehensive massager strength for the acupoints of eye muscles. It also has 9 vibrate modes that you can choose from depending on your personal need.

The built-in magnets, multi-frequency vibration, and acupoints massage of HappyEyes‚Ñ¢ Wireless Eye Massager help to relieve eye fatigue, promote eye blood flow, relax eye muscle, help provide quality sleep, and improve eyesight.

HappyEyes‚Ñ¢ Wireless Eye Massager is designed for people with shortsightedness, farsightedness, astigmatism, hyperopia and for people who overuse eyes.

Friendly Reminder:¬†

  • The built-in lithium battery needs to be charged for 2 hours, and can be continuously used for 3 hours.

  • It is prohibited to use this product in the bathroom or other high temperature place.
  • Don‚Äôt immerse the unit into the water.
  • Don‚Äôt place it with flammable objects and don‚Äôt place it under the sun.

How to Use:

Step 1: Wear the wireless eye massager.
Step 2: Press the power button and select your desired vibration mode.

3 times a day

3-5 minutes per session

entry.title: ICONSIGN¬Æ DIY Eyelash Lifting Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 39.99

Product Description:

Long, thick, and curled lashes can make you have that wide-eyed-charming-look, so do not be surprised there are lots and lots of women investing time and effort in front of a mirror just to make their lashes beautifully curled. However, keeping them curled all day long is quite challenging, especially if you're using the traditional rollers. With ICONSIGN¬Æ DIY Eyelash Lifting Kit, it is easy for you to achieve curled lashes, which can last for up to eight (8) weeks!

¬†

ICONSIGN¬Æ DIY Eyelash Lifting Kit contains keratin solution treatment of premium quality which has been tested for all skin and hair types ‚Äî to guarantee safety and effectiveness.

With this revolutionary eyelash perming kit, beautifully curled lashes can be enjoyed without needing a curler, eyelash extensions or a mascara. You can also save yourself from worrying about the burning or stinging sensation since the ICONSIGN¬Æ DIY Eyelash Lifting Kit is vegan, safe, and toxic-free.

¬†

ICONSIGN¬Æ Eyelash Lifting Kit comes with:

  • Perm Lotion - a curing agent that allows the eyelashes to curl naturally beautiful.
  • Fixation Lotion - helps the lash to keep its curl for approximately 3 months.
  • Cleanser Lotion - helps to clean off oil, dust, and makeup residue.
  • Nutrition Lotion - repairs, protects, and moisturizes the eyelashes.
  • Silicon Lift Pads (5 pieces, medium and large) - provides an excellent curling angle to fix the eyelashes. All is very easy to use.
  • Glue - specially formulated for use with the silicon pads. It has a mild gentle scent and low irritation that does not produce those annoying hard to remove white flakes.

¬†

How to Use:

Step 1: Using the cleanser lotion, clean off the oil, dust, and makeup residue on eyelashes.

Step 2: Put under eye pads on the lower eyelid.

Step 3: Stick the silicone eye pads on the upper eyelid.

Step 4: Apply the glue on eyelashes and silicone eye pads.

Step 5: Brush eyelashes using the Y shape brush, then cover the plastic film on eyelashes for about 10 minutes.

Step 6: Apply the perm lotion on eyelashes, then cover the plastic film on eyelashes for about 10 minutes.

Step 7: Apply the fixation lotion on the eyelashes, then cover the plastic film on eyelashes for about 10 minutes.

Step 8: Remove the plastic film, then use the cleanser lotion to clean off all perm residue.

Step 9: Apply the nutrition lotion to repair eyelashes.

¬†

Warning:

  • The solution can cause eye/skin irritation if not used properly.
  • If the solutions get into eyes, flush with cool water for 5 minutes or until gone.
  • If problems persist, go to a professional. We are not responsible for misuse or damage caused by this product.
  • Please keep away from children at all times.

¬†

Specifications:

Type: Eyelash Perming Kit

Net Weight: 25ml in 1 kit

Color: Pink, Yellow, Blue, Clear

¬†

Includes:

5 x Silicone Pads (S, M, M1, M2, L)

3 x 2 Heads Y-shaped Perming Brushes

1 x Bottle Cleanser Agent

1 x Bottle Perming Agent

1 x Bottle Fixing Agent

1 x Bottle Moisturizing Agent

1 x Bottle Perming Glue

1 x 5ml Bottle False Lashes Glue

entry.title: LashUp‚Ñ¢ Heated Eyelash Curler
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 39.99

Product Description:

Admit it or not, having long, thick and, curly lashes can make you look more beguiling. The problem is, not all are fortunate enough to have such a beautiful set of lashes, which is why most women use an eyelash curler to enhance theirs. Good news, our LashUp‚Ñ¢ Heated Eyelash Curler¬†will definitely give your lashes an awesome curl!

This revolutionary lash curler, which is made from aluminum and ABS materials, features a sleek design thus fits naturally in your hand.

Portable flash drive-like curler has two levels of temperature, Blue Light, for normal temperature, and Red Light, for high temperature, which allows you to easily curl your lashes without pinching, tugging or pulling.

¬†

From the long duration of traditional curling, this one allows you to create curly lashes instantly with its high-speed design, ideal even with false eyelashes, extensions and even for the brows!

The oriented grooves on the heating area protect your eyes while curling your lashes!

Although the traditional eyelash curler has many advantages, it can't be denied that accidental pulling on the lashes while curling can cause to weakening of the roots. This is why Rechargeable Heated Eyelash Curler is a good choice as it gently shapes lashes into a gorgeous curl that can last for hours without pinching or squeezing.

  • Creates natural-looking, long-lasting curl in an instant
  • Gives maximum curl without damaging your eyelashes
  • Comes with a protective cap; won't turn on accidentally
  • Has anti-damage system
  • Portable; easy to store and carry during travel
  • Rechargeable
  • Safe to use

How to Use:

Step 1: Remove the protective cover and connect it to a USB Port.

Step 2: Wait for 1 hour to fully complete charging or when the Blue light turns into Green.

Step 3: Remove the curler from the USB port and put back the protective cover.

¬†

Step 1:¬† Remove the protective cover and press the power button. The indicator light indicates that the product is in a normal working state. Representative high temperature of the first stage (light red), the second stage thermostat (light blue), the third stage thermostat (red and blue LEDs).

Step 2: Apply the mascara evenly before use

Step 3: Personally select the correct level according to the temperature (ambient temperature of 24 ¬∞ C, the first temperature 60 ¬∞ C + 5 ¬∞ C, the second temperature 50 ¬∞ C + 5 ¬∞ C, in level 3 level 40 ¬∞ C + 5 ¬∞ C).

Step 4: After 15-20 seconds of extreme warming, it gets hot.

Step 5: Place The brush head for a few seconds under the eyelashes, the lash curls from the bottom to the top. Then lashes in individual parts, such as the root, middle and tail each section for 3-5 seconds.

Step 6: Turn off the device after use and close the protective cover. If you need to clean the comb, simply wipe it with a soft cloth or paper towel. Do not wash in water.

Specifications:

Material: Aluminum, ABS

Type: Eyelash Curler

Power:¬†USB Charging

Charging time [USB Charging]:¬†1-2 hours

Color: Black, Red, White

The problem is not all can afford to get such service, hence there are false eyelash extensions available in the market. Although traditional falsies can add to your appeal, we can't deny that it cannot give long-lasting benefits. But not with BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash!

BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash is 100% handmade and uses high-grade A fiber material, which ensures ultra-soft and long lash strands. Also, the product contains no animal hair nor tested on animals, hence vegan and 100% cruelty-free.¬†

With its super comfortable and lightweight feature, BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash can be easily adjusted and worn all day long. Not to mention that it won't give you the feel of wearing falsies.

Given that this eyelash is magnetic, there's no reason for you to use glue, which might cause irritation to your eyes.

  • Makes your eyes dazzle
  • Comes with different eyelash styles
  • Blends in perfectly; making it look like natural eyelashes
  • Easy to apply; no special skills or makeup experience needed
  • Contains no animal hair ‚Äî vegan and 100% cruelty-free
  • Safe to use; won't cause any irritation to the eyes
  • Super convenient; easy to bring everywhere
  • Comes with an eyelash holder; enables you to easily adjust your eyelashes

¬†

In addition, BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash has five thin magnets, allowing you to quickly and easily put on the magnetic lashes without feeling irritated.

¬†

How to Use:

Step 1: When using the magnetic eyelash, you will need Magnetic Eyeliner, which the lashes will cling on to. Using the magnetic liner, draw a line along your lash line. (If you're using eyeshadow, apply it before the eyeliner.)
Step 2: ¬†Wait until the Magnetic Eyeliner is totally dry. The liner must be dry in order to attach the magnetic lashes.
Step 3: Gently place the magnetic lashes on your lash line.
Step 4:¬†Once you're satisfied with the placement, gently press the lash down to set it properly.

How to Remove

Step 1: Gently pull the magnetic eyelashes off.
Step 2: Remove the remaining makeup residue from magnets using oil-based makeup remover. Do not wash the lashes in order to not damage the lash strips.
Step 3: Properly store the lashes in carrying case for future use.

How to Use:

¬†

Step 3: Leave it until dry or wait for 30 minutes to 2 hours.

¬†

Step 4: Peel the gel on your brows, make sure to remove all to keep your eyebrows clean and on fleek!

Specifications:

Ingredient: Red wine extract

Liquid Content: 0.01lb

Weight: 0.09lb

Color: Dark Brown, Natural Brown, Black Grey

Include:

1 x Tattoo Brow Gel Tint

Notes:

Due to the different monitor and light effect, the actual color of the item might be slightly different from the color shown on the pictures.¬†

Please add 0.1-0.3cm differences due to manual measurement.

entry.title: BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash & Eyeliner Kit (3 Pairs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 39.99

Product Description:

¬†

Having long, thick, and curly lashes can undoubtedly enhance the eyes, as well as your look, however, not all are blessed with beautiful lashes. This is why some resort to getting eyelash extension, and some even paired it with having an eyeliner embroidery. But not everyone could afford or simply are hesitant about these beauty trends, hence there are alternatives like putting false eyelashes on and temporary eyeliner. Setting aside the benefits that these options can give are the downsides, such as the hassle that comes with using normal false eyelashes and eyeliner, plus it can be time-consuming, especially for those who aren't used to these. Thanks there is BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelash & Eyeliner Kit!

This magnetic eyelash & eyeliner kit is 100% handmade and uses high-grade A fiber material, which ensures ultra-soft and long lash strands. Also, the product contains no animal hair nor tested on animals, hence vegan and 100% cruelty-free.¬†

¬†

Given it's super comfortable and lightweight, BloomVenus‚Ñ¢ Magnetic Eyelashes & Eyeliner Kit can be easily adjusted and worn all day long. Plus, it can make you feel like you're not wearing falsies at all.

Unlike the usual fake eyelashes which use glue, this magnetic eyelash & eyeliner kit does not, thus suitable for those who have sensitive skin and glue allergy.

  • Makes your eyes dazzle
  • Comes with different eyelash styles
  • Blends in perfectly; making it look like natural eyelashes
  • Easy to apply; no special skills or makeup experience needed
  • Contains no animal hair ‚Äî vegan and 100% cruelty-free
  • Safe to use; won't cause any irritation to the eyes
  • Super convenient; easy to bring everywhere
  • The kit comes with an eyelash holder; enables you to easily adjust your eyelashes

The magnetic eyeliner features a 1mm tip that enables you to draw a precise line on top of your lashes with just a single stroke.

With five thin magnets, you can quickly and easily put on the magnetic lashes without feeling irritated.

How to Use:

Step 1: Apply BloomVenus Magnetic Eyeliner above your lash line like you normally would. (If you're using eyeshadow, apply it before the eyeliner.)
Step 2: Add a second coat of eyeliner.
Step 3: Wait until the Magnetic Eyeliner is totally dry. The liner must be dry in order to attach the magnetic lashes.
Step 4: Gently place the magnetic lashes on your lash line.
Step 5: Once you're satisfied with the placement, gently press the lash down to set it properly.Ôªø

How to Remove

Step 1: Gently pull the magnetic eyelashes off.
Step 2: Remove the remaining makeup residue from magnets using oil-based makeup remover.¬†Do not wash the lashes in order to not damage the lash strips.
Step 3: Properly store the lashes in carrying case for future use.

Specifications:

Material: Chemical Fiber
Type: Magnetic Eyelash & Eyeliner
False Eyelashes Length: 1cm - 1.5cm
Magnetic Eyeliner Volume: 5ml
Product Size: 13.3*11.7*2.8cm [box]
Color: Black

Include:

1 x Magnetic Liquid Eyeliner

3 x Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes

1 x Eyelash Holder (tweezers)

Note:

  • Please be advised that magnetic eyelashes can only be worn once the eyeliner is completely dry.
  • Store the magnetic eyelashes when not in use.
  • Remove the magnetic eyelashes off before washing your face, showering, and sleeping.
  • The color of the product shown in the pictures may slightly vary from the actual item due to the differences in the monitor and light effect.
  • Please allow slight measuring deviation due to manual measurement.
